lab4.data

Class GameGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • lab4.data.GameGrid

  • public class GameGrid
extends java.util.Observable
    Represents a two-dimensional game grid for a game of Gomoku.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameGrid(int size)
      Initializes a game grid with size*size squares.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameGrid

        public GameGrid(int size)
        Initializes a game grid with size*size squares.
        Parameters:
        size - The width/height of the game grid.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocation

        public int getLocation(int x,
              int y)
        What is in the square?
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the tile.
        y - The y coordinate of the tile.
        Returns:
        The value of the specified tile.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        What is the grid size?
        Returns:
        The grid size.

      • move

        public boolean move(int x,
           int y,
           int player)
        Attempts to place a tile in the specified square.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position.
        y - The y position.
        player - The player performing the move.
        Returns:
        (1) true if the tile was successfully placed, (2) false if it the square was already occupied.

      • clearGrid

        public void clearGrid()
        Clears the grid, removing all the tiles.

      • isWinner

        public boolean isWinner(int player)
        Does the player have 5 tiles in a row?
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose tiles are being checked.
        Returns:
        (1) true if player currently has 5 tiles in row, (2) false if he doesn't.
